title: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: I observed that in build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2 and KDE 2.2, when I open the ImageAnalyzer example, the scrollbars are enabled. However, I can move them around but they don't have any effect. This issue is particularly noticeable when I open a small image, such as an icon, because the scrollbars are misleading and do not serve any purpose.
